verses.verse: The word<WH1697> that came to Jeremiah<WH3414> from Yahweh,<WH3068> saying,<WH559>

"Stand<WH5975> in the gate<WH8179> of Yahweh<WH3068>'s house,<WH1004> and proclaim<WH7121> there this word,<WH1697> and say,<WH559> <WH8085> 'Hear the word<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> all you of Judah,<WH3063> who enter in<WH935> at these gates<WH8179> to worship<WH7812> Yahweh.<WH3068>

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> Amend<WH3190> your ways<WH1870> and your doings,<WH4611> and I will cause you to dwell<WH7931> in this place.<WH4725>
Don't<WH982> trust in lying<WH8267> words,<WH1697> saying,<WH559> The temple<WH1964> of Yahweh,<WH3068> the temple<WH1964> of Yahweh,<WH3068> the temple<WH1964> of Yahweh,<WH3068> are these.
For if you thoroughly<WH3190> amend<WH3190> your ways<WH1870> and your doings;<WH4611> if you thoroughly<WH6213> execute<WH6213> justice<WH4941> between a man<WH376> and his neighbor;<WH7453>

if you don't<WH6231> oppress the foreigner,<WH1616> the fatherless,<WH3490> and the widow,<WH490> and don't<WH8210> shed innocent<WH5355> blood<WH1818> in this place,<WH4725> neither walk<WH3212> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430> to your own hurt:<WH7451>
then will I cause you to dwell<WH7931> in this place,<WH4725> in the land<WH776> that I gave<WH5414> to your fathers,<WH1> from of old<WH5769> even<WH5704> forevermore.<WH5769>
Behold,<WH982> you trust in lying<WH8267> words,<WH1697> that can't<WH3276> profit.

Will you steal,<WH1589> murder,<WH7523> and commit adultery,<WH5003> and swear<WH7650> falsely,<WH8267> and burn incense<WH6999> to Baal,<WH1168> and walk<WH1980> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430> that you have not known,<WH3045>

and come<WH935> and stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> me in this house,<WH1004> which is called<WH7121> by my name,<WH8034> and say,<WH559> We are delivered;<WH5337> that you may do<WH6213> all these abominations?<WH8441>
Is this house,<WH1004> which is called<WH7121> by my name,<WH8034> become a den<WH4631> of robbers<WH6530> in your eyes?<WH5869> Behold,<WH7200> I, even I, have seen it,<WH5002> says Yahweh.<WH3068>

But go<WH3212> now to my place<WH4725> which was in Shiloh,<WH7887> where I caused my name<WH8034> to dwell<WH7931> at the first,<WH7223> and see<WH7200> what I did<WH6213> to it for<WH6440> the wickedness<WH7451> of my people<WH5971> Israel.<WH3478>

Now,<WH6213> because you have done all these works,<WH4639> says<WH5002> Yahweh,<WH3068> and I spoke<WH1696> to you,<WH7925> rising up early and speaking,<WH1696> but you didn't<WH8085> hear; and I called<WH7121> you,<WH6030> but you didn't answer:

therefore will I do<WH6213> to the house<WH1004> which is called<WH7121> by my name,<WH8034> in which you trust,<WH982> and to the place<WH4725> which I gave<WH5414> to you and to your fathers,<WH1> as I did<WH6213> to Shiloh.<WH7887>
I will cast you out<WH7993> of my sight,<WH6440> as I have cast out<WH7993> all your brothers,<WH251> even the whole seed<WH2233> of Ephraim.<WH669>

Therefore don't<WH6419> pray for this people,<WH5971> neither lift up<WH5375> a cry<WH7440> nor prayer<WH8605> for them,<WH1157> neither make intercession<WH6293> to me;<WH8085> for I will not hear you.
Don't<WH7200> you see what they do<WH6213> in the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063> and in the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem?<WH3389>

The children<WH1121> gather<WH3950> wood,<WH6086> and the fathers<WH1> kindle<WH1197> the fire,<WH784> and the women<WH802> knead<WH3888> the dough,<WH1217> to make<WH6213> cakes<WH3561> to the queen<WH4446> of the sky,<WH8064> and to pour out<WH5258> drink offerings<WH5262> to other<WH312> gods,<WH430> that they may provoke me to anger.<WH3707>
Do they provoke me to anger?<WH3707> says<WH5002> Yahweh.<WH3068> Don't<WH1322> they provoke themselves, to the confusion of their own faces?<WH6440>

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> Behold,<WH639> my anger and my wrath<WH2534> shall be poured out<WH5413> on this place,<WH4725> on man,<WH120> and on animal,<WH929> and on the trees<WH6086> of the field,<WH7704> and on the fruit<WH6529> of the ground;<WH127> and it shall burn,<WH1197> and shall not be quenched.<WH3518>
Thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel:<WH3478> Add<WH5595> your burnt offerings<WH5930> to your sacrifices,<WH2077> and eat<WH398> meat.<WH1320>

For I didn't<WH1696> speak to your fathers,<WH1> nor command<WH6680> them in the day<WH3117> that I brought them out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> concerning<WH1697> burnt offerings<WH5930> or sacrifices:<WH2077>

but this thing<WH1697> I commanded<WH6680> them,<WH559> saying, Listen<WH8085> to my voice,<WH6963> and I will be your God,<WH430> and you shall be my people;<WH5971> and walk<WH1980> in all the way<WH1870> that I command<WH6680> you,<WH3190> that it may be well with you.

But they didn't<WH8085> listen nor turn<WH5186> their ear,<WH241> but walked<WH3212> in their own counsels<WH4156> and in the stubbornness<WH8307> of their evil<WH7451> heart,<WH3820> and went backward,<WH268> and not forward.<WH6440>

Since the day<WH3117> that your fathers<WH1> came forth out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> to this day,<WH3117> I have sent<WH7971> to you all my servants<WH5650> the prophets,<WH5030> daily<WH3117> rising up early<WH7925> and sending them:<WH7971>
yet they didn't<WH8085> listen to me,<WH5186> nor inclined their ear,<WH241> but made their neck<WH6203> stiff:<WH7185> they did worse<WH7489> than their fathers.<WH1>
You shall speak<WH1696> all these words<WH1697> to them;<WH8085> but they will not listen to you:<WH7121> you shall also call to them;<WH6030> but they will not answer you.

You shall tell<WH559> them,<WH1471> This is the nation that has not listened<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of Yahweh<WH3068> their God,<WH430> nor received<WH3947> instruction:<WH4148> truth<WH530> is perished,<WH6> and is cut off<WH3772> from their mouth.<WH6310>

Cut off<WH1494> your hair,<WH5145> and throw it away,<WH7993> and take up<WH5375> a lamentation<WH7015> on the bare heights;<WH8205> for Yahweh<WH3068> has rejected<WH3988> and forsaken<WH5203> the generation<WH1755> of his wrath.<WH5678>

For the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> have done<WH6213> that which is evil<WH7451> in my sight,<WH5869> says<WH5002> Yahweh:<WH3068> they have set<WH7760> their abominations<WH8251> in the house<WH1004> which is called<WH7121> by my name,<WH8034> to defile it.<WH2930>

They have built<WH1129> the high places<WH1116> of Topheth,<WH8612> which is in the valley<WH1516> of the son<WH1121> of Hinnom,<WH2011> to burn<WH8313> their sons<WH1121> and their daughters<WH1323> in the fire;<WH784> which I didn't<WH6680> command, nor did it come<WH5927> into my mind.<WH3820>

Therefore,<WH3117> behold, the days come,<WH935> says<WH5002> Yahweh,<WH3068> that it shall no more be called<WH559> Topheth,<WH8612> nor The valley<WH1516> of the son<WH1121> of Hinnom,<WH2011> but The valley<WH1516> of Slaughter:<WH2028> for they shall bury<WH6912> in Topheth,<WH8612> until there is no<WH369> place to bury.<WH4725>

The dead bodies<WH5038> of this people<WH5971> shall be food<WH3978> for the birds<WH5775> of the sky,<WH8064> and for the animals<WH929> of the earth;<WH776> and none shall frighten them away.<WH2729>

Then will I cause to cease<WH7673> from the cities<WH5892> of Judah,<WH3063> and from the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> the voice<WH6963> of mirth<WH8342> and the voice<WH6963> of gladness,<WH8057> the voice<WH6963> of the bridegroom<WH2860> and the voice<WH6963> of the bride;<WH3618> for the land<WH776> shall become a waste.<WH2723>
